task.title: Completing a Daily Review Session
task.shortdesc: Practice your audio slices using the flashcard review interface.

prereq.p: You must have audio slices with translations to review. Slices become available for review based on their scheduling.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Daily Review page from the main menu.
step.stepresult: The Review Board displays your due cards in a carousel layout.

step.cmd: Press Space or click the play button to listen to the audio.
step.info: Listen carefully to the pronunciation and try to understand the content.

step.cmd: Read the translation displayed on the card.
step.info: If the translation is missing or incorrect, click on it to edit directly.

step.cmd: Press Enter or click Show Answer to reveal the original English text.

choices.choice: Click Forgot (or press 1) if you couldn't recall it
Click Good (or press 2) if you remembered correctly

step.stepresult: The card advances and the next due card appears.

step.cmd: Continue until all due cards are completed.
step.stepresult: A celebration screen appears when you finish all reviews.

result.p: Your review progress is saved automatically. Cards marked "Good" advance to higher boxes and will be scheduled for later review. Cards marked "Forgot" return to Box 1 for more frequent practice.
